## üîß Configuration Basics

Bodh uses YAML files to configure presentations. Create a `bodh.yml` file in your project directory to customize themes, layouts, and features.

## üìù Configuration Examples

All examples use the **same comprehensive gradient descent content** but with different configurations to demonstrate the power of customization.

### Modern Configuration
```yaml
# configs/gradient-descent-modern.yml
theme:
  name: "modern"

logo:
  path: "examples/sample-logo.svg"
  position: "bottom-right" 
  size: "medium"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "Slide {current}"
  position: "top-right"

font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 18

pdf:
  engine: "playwright"
```
**Result**: [Modern Style](examples/gradient-descent-modern.html)

### Minimal Configuration
```yaml
# configs/gradient-descent-minimal.yml
theme:
  name: "minimal"

# No logo for clean look
logo:
  enabled: false

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "{current}/{total}"
  position: "bottom-right"

font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 20

pdf:
  engine: "playwright"
```
**Result**: [Minimal Style](examples/gradient-descent-minimal.html)

### Academic Configuration  
```yaml
# configs/gradient-descent-academic.yml
theme:
  name: "default"

logo:
  path: "examples/sample-logo.svg"
  position: "top-center" 
  size: "small"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "Page {current} of {total}"
  position: "bottom-center"

font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 14  # Smaller for more content

pdf:
  engine: "latex"  # LaTeX backend for academic quality
  latex_engine: "pdflatex"

colors:
  background: "#ffffff"
  text: "#000000"
  accent: "#8b0000"  # Dark red for academic look
```
**Result**: [Academic Style](examples/gradient-descent-academic.html)

### Presentation Configuration
```yaml
# configs/gradient-descent-presentation.yml
theme:
  name: "modern"

logo:
  path: "examples/sample-logo.svg"
  position: "bottom-right" 
  size: "large"

slide_number:
  enabled: false  # No slide numbers for clean presentation

font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 24  # Large for presentations

colors:
  background: "#ffffff"
  text: "#2d3748"
  accent: "#e53e3e"  # Bold red for emphasis
```
**Result**: [Presentation Style](examples/gradient-descent-presentation.html)

## üìä Real-World Examples

### Academic Presentation
```yaml
# academic.yml - For research presentations
theme: metropolis
font:
  family: "Fira Sans"
  size: 18

style:
  hrule:
    enabled: true
    width: "70%"
    style: "solid"
  bullets:
    style: "default"
    color: "primary"

layout:
  columns: 1
  alignment: "left"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current/total"

navigation:
  show_dots: false
  show_progress: false
```

### Tech Conference Talk  
```yaml
# tech-talk.yml - For developer presentations
theme: dark
font:
  family: "Fira Code"
  size: 16

logo:
  source: "tech-logo.svg"
  location: "bottom-right"
  size: 80

style:
  shadows: true
  rounded_corners: true
  bullets:
    style: "arrow"
    color: "accent"

overlays:
  enabled: true
  transition: "slide"

navigation:
  show_progress: true
  keyboard_shortcuts: true
```

### Corporate Pitch
```yaml
# corporate.yml - For business presentations  
theme: modern
font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 20

logo:
  source: "company-logo.png"
  location: "top-left"
  size: 150

style:
  shadows: false
  rounded_corners: false
  hrule:
    enabled: false
  bullets:
    style: "circle"
    color: "primary"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current"
  position: "bottom-right"

navigation:
  show_dots: false
  show_arrows: true
```

### Design Portfolio
```yaml
# portfolio.yml - For creative presentations
theme: minimal
font:
  family: "Source Sans Pro"
  size: 24

style:
  slide_padding: "4rem"
  element_margin: "2rem"
  shadows: false
  bullets:
    style: "square"
    color: "accent"

layout:
  alignment: "center"

navigation:
  show_dots: true
  show_arrows: false
  show_progress: false

slide_number:
  enabled: false
```

### Educational Content
```yaml
# education.yml - For teaching and courses
theme: sky
font:
  family: "Roboto"
  size: 22

style:
  rounded_corners: true
  shadows: true
  bullets:
    style: "default"
    color: "primary"

layout:
  columns: 1
  alignment: "left"

overlays:
  enabled: true
  transition: "fade"
  duration: "0.3s"

navigation:
  enabled: true
  show_progress: true
  keyboard_shortcuts: true

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current/total"
```

## üéØ Configuration Tips

### Performance Optimization
```yaml
# Fast rendering for development
style:
  animations: false
  shadows: false
  rounded_corners: false

# High quality for final export  
style:
  animations: true
  shadows: true
  rounded_corners: true
```

### Accessibility
```yaml
# High contrast for better readability
theme: dark  # or minimal
font:
  size: 24   # Larger text

style:
  bullets:
    size: "1.5em"  # Larger bullets
    
navigation:
  keyboard_shortcuts: true  # Always enable
```

### Print Optimization
```yaml
# Optimized for PDF export
theme: minimal
style:
  shadows: false      # Avoid printing issues
  animations: false   # Not needed in PDF
  
layout:
  alignment: "left"   # Better for reading

slide_number:
  enabled: true       # Helpful in printed form
  format: "current/total"
```

## üìÅ File Organization

### Project Structure
```
my-presentation/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bodh.yml           # Main configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ slides.md          # Presentation content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ images/            # Image assets
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logo.png
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ charts/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ configs/           # Alternative configs
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ dark-theme.yml
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ print-ready.yml
```

### Multiple Configurations
```bash
# Use different configs for different outputs
python bodh.py slides.md -c configs/web-preview.yml --html
python bodh.py slides.md -c configs/print-ready.yml -o final.pdf
```

## üîç Validation and Testing

Bodh automatically validates your configuration and provides helpful error messages:

```bash
# Test configuration
python bodh.py --config bodh.yml --validate-only

# Common validation errors:
# - Invalid theme names
# - Font sizes out of range (8-72px)
# - Invalid color formats
# - Missing logo files
```
